** 29 盜跖第二十九

# dating: 8110
今先生，¶
世之才士也，¶	KR2c0021_086:280a:2:5:16,KR5c0051_009:33b:3:10:4,KR5c0126_029:2a:10:1:3,KR5c0127_093:001b:1:5:2,KR5c0128_030:001b:1:8:2,KR5c0135_029:001b:3:8:4,KR5c0136_018:001b:4:8:3,KR5c0138_009:23b:7:7:4,KR5c0139_031:001b:10:2:4,KR5h0057_007:020a:8:10:22,KR5i0036_005:05p031b:1:6:14

妄作孝悌	KR5c0051_009:34b:6:17:5,KR5c0126_029:4a:24:1:10,KR5c0127_093:002a:6:17:2,KR5c0128_030:002a:7:8:2,KR5c0135_029:002a:9:8:4,KR5c0139_031:003a:3:2:5
而儌倖於封侯富貴者也。¶	KR5c0126_029:4a:24:5:10,KR5c0136_018:002a:10:12:3,KR5c0139_031:003a:3:6:5
子之罪大極重，¶	KR2c0021_086:280b:7:18:16,KR3k0056_032:40a:3:3:4,KR5c0051_009:34b:8:1:5,KR5c0126_029:4a:25:1:10,KR5c0128_030:002a:8:5:2,KR5c0135_029:002a:10:5:4,KR5c0136_018:002b:1:5:4,KR5c0138_009:24b:5:15:4,KR5c0139_031:003a:7:1:5,KR5h0057_007:021a:5:8:23,KR5i0036_005:05p032a:4:1:14
疾走歸！¶
不然，¶
我將以子肝益晝餔之膳！』」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_029-5a>¶	KR2c0021_086:280b:8:8:16,KR5c0126_029:4a:28:1:10,KR5c0127_093:002a:8:7:2,KR5c0135_029:002a:10:16:4,KR5c0136_018:002b:1:16:4,KR5h0057_007:021a:6:2:23

# src: ZHUANG 29.1.12 Guo Qingfan 992; Wang Shumin 1174; Fang Yong 809; Chen Guying 777

「丘來前！¶

耕而食，¶
織而衣，¶
无有相害之心，¶	KR5c0126_029:4a:123:1:23

天下何故不謂子為盜丘，而乃謂我為盜跖？¶

# src: ZHUANG 29.1.30 Guo Qingfan 997; Wang Shumin 11i2; Fang Yong i10; Chen Guying 779
# dating: 8110

世之所高也，¶	KR2a0001_500:1771a:3:1:3698,KR2a0008_035:2a:6:19:1,KR4e0208_012:2a:6:10:2,KR4h0061_026:22b:2:2:54,KR5c0051_009:38b:2:2:5,KR5c0126_029:9a:40:1:29,KR5c0127_093:004b:2:17:2,KR5c0128_030:004b:6:3:2,KR5c0130_000:016a:5:11:122,KR5c0135_029:004b:8:3:7,KR5c0136_018:004b:9:2:6,KR5c0139_031:007b:10:5:10,KR5h0057_007:023b:3:4:26,KR5i0036_005:05p033b:10:19:14
孰論之，¶
皆以利惑其真	KR2c0021_086:283a:6:20:16,KR5c0126_029:9a:42:1:29,KR5c0138_009:27a:7:19:4
而強反其情性，¶	KR5c0126_029:9a:42:7:29
其行乃甚可羞也。	KR2c0021_086:283a:7:11:16,KR5c0051_009:38b:3:5:5,KR5c0126_029:9a:43:1:29,KR5c0128_030:004b:7:6:2,KR5c0135_029:004b:9:6:7,KR5c0136_018:004b:10:5:6,KR5c0138_009:27a:8:10:4,KR5c0139_031:008a:1:8:10,KR5h0057_007:023b:4:9:26,KR5i0036_005:05p034a:1:15:14

不成者為尾。』」<pb:KR5c0126_CHANT_029-17a>¶	KR2c0021_095:172b:6:5:4,KR3k0045_003:2b:8:2:2,KR5c0126_029:13a:102:1:47,KR5c0138_009:30a:2:21:4

# dating: 8110
子張曰：¶
「子不為行，¶	KR2c0021_095:172b:6:13:4,KR5c0126_029:13a:104:1:48,KR5c0138_009:30a:3:8:4
即將䟽戚无倫，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:105:1:48
貴賤无義，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:106:1:48
長幼无序；¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:107:1:48
五紀六位，將何以為別乎？」¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:108:1:48

『小人殉財，¶	KR5c0051_009:43a:2:10:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:128:1:52,KR5c0127_093:010a:5:8:22,KR5c0128_030:008a:7:15:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:3:15:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:5:15:9,KR5c0138_009:30a:8:19:4,KR5c0139_031:016b:5:10:19,KR5i0036_005:05p036a:10:26:14,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:3:6:14
君子殉名。¶	KR5c0051_009:43a:2:14:5,KR5c0116_003:016a:8:6:12,KR5c0123_017:001a:6:25:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:129:1:52,KR5c0127_093:010a:5:12:22,KR5c0128_030:008a:8:2:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:4:2:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:6:2:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:1:2:4,KR5c0139_031:016b:5:14:19,KR5i0036_005:05p036a:10:30:14
其所以變其情，¶	KR2c0021_095:173a:1:11:4,KR5c0051_009:43a:3:4:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:130:1:52,KR5c0127_093:010a:5:16:22,KR5c0128_030:008a:8:6:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:4:6:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:6:6:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:1:6:4,KR5c0139_031:016b:6:1:19,KR5h0057_007:026b:2:7:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:1:3:14
易其性，¶
則異矣；¶
乃至於棄其所為	KR2c0021_095:173a:1:23:4,KR5c0126_029:13a:133:1:52,KR5c0138_009:30b:1:18:4
而殉其所不為，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:133:8:52,KR5c0138_009:30b:2:4:4
則一也。』¶

故曰：¶
无為小人，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:136:1:53
反殉而天；¶	KR5c0051_009:43a:5:7:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:137:1:53,KR5c0127_093:010a:7:16:22,KR5c0128_030:008a:10:6:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:6:6:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:8:6:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:2:19:4,KR5c0139_031:017a:3:7:19,KR5h0057_007:026b:4:7:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:3:2:14
无為君子，¶	KR1a0143_005:18a:6:12:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:138:1:53
從天之理。¶	KR2c0021_095:173a:2:11:4,KR5c0126_029:13a:139:1:53,KR5c0127_093:010a:8:7:22,KR5c0128_030:008a:10:14:2,KR5c0128_030:010a:7:5:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:6:14:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:8:14:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:3:6:4,KR5c0139_031:017a:3:15:19,KR5h0057_007:026b:4:15:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:3:30:14,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:4:22:14,KR5i0036_005:05p041b:10:17:14

執而圓機；¶	KR2c0021_095:173a:2:35:4,KR5c0051_009:43a:7:8:5,KR5c0092_003:030a:2:16:89,KR5c0126_029:13a:145:1:54,KR5c0127_093:010a:9:14:22,KR5c0128_030:008b:2:4:2,KR5c0128_030:010b:3:10:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:8:4:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:10:4:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:4:9:4,KR5c0139_031:017a:10:5:19,KR5h0057_007:026b:6:5:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:6:15:14
獨成而意，¶	KR2c0021_095:173a:2:39:4,KR5c0051_009:43a:7:12:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:146:1:54,KR5c0127_093:010a:10:1:22,KR5c0127_093:011a:9:12:22,KR5c0128_030:008b:2:8:2,KR5c0128_030:010b:4:14:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:8:8:10,KR5c0136_018:008a:10:8:9,KR5c0138_009:30b:4:13:4,KR5c0139_031:017a:10:9:19,KR5h0057_007:026b:6:9:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:6:19:14,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:7:29:14,KR5i0036_005:05p042a:1:17:14
與道俳佪。¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:147:1:54
无轉而行，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:148:1:54
无成而義，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:149:1:54
將失而所為。¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:150:1:54
无赴而富，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:151:1:54
无殉而成，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:152:1:54
將棄而天。¶	KR2c0021_095:173a:3:26:4,KR5c0051_009:43b:1:7:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:153:1:54,KR5c0127_093:010b:1:13:22,KR5c0127_093:011b:1:10:22,KR5c0127_093:013a:3:16:22,KR5c0128_030:008b:4:3:2,KR5c0128_030:010b:9:13:2,KR5c0135_029:007b:10:3:10,KR5c0136_018:008b:2:3:10,KR5c0139_031:017b:8:9:20,KR5h0057_007:026b:8:4:29,KR5i0036_005:05p036b:9:8:14

今子獨无意焉，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:179:1:58
知不足邪，¶	KR5c0051_009:44a:4:16:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:180:1:58,KR5c0128_030:011b:1:3:2,KR5c0136_018:008b:10:4:10,KR5c0139_031:019b:1:3:22

知和曰：¶
「今夫此人以為與己同時而生，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:184:1:59
同鄉而處者，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:185:1:59,KR5c0127_094:001a:9:1:2,KR5c0128_030:011b:3:2:2,KR5c0135_029:008b:1:2:11,KR5c0136_018:009a:2:3:10,KR5c0138_009:31b:2:6:4,KR5c0139_031:020a:2:16:22,KR5h0057_007:027b:1:2:30,KR5i0036_005:05p037a:10:29:14
以為夫絕俗過世之士焉；¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:186:1:59
是專无主正，¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:187:1:59
所以覽古今之時，¶	KR5c0051_009:44b:3:1:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:188:1:59,KR5c0127_094:001a:10:3:2,KR5c0128_030:011b:4:5:2,KR5c0135_029:008b:2:5:11,KR5c0136_018:009a:3:6:10,KR5c0139_031:020a:4:2:22,KR5h0057_007:027b:2:5:30,KR5i0036_005:05p037b:1:20:14
是非之分也，¶	KR2o0020_071:28a:8:32:102,KR5c0051_009:44b:3:8:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:189:1:59,KR5c0127_094:001a:10:10:2,KR5c0128_030:011b:4:12:2,KR5c0128_031:005b:8:16:2,KR5c0135_029:008b:2:12:11,KR5c0136_018:009a:3:13:10,KR5c0138_009:31b:3:12:4,KR5c0139_031:020a:4:9:22,KR5h0057_007:027b:2:12:30,KR5i0036_005:05p037b:2:5:14,KR5i0036_005:05p050b:1:18:20
與俗化。世	KR5c0051_009:44b:3:13:5,KR5c0126_029:13a:190:1:59,KR5c0127_094:001a:10:15:2,KR5c0128_030:011b:4:17:2,KR5c0135_029:008b:2:17:11,KR5c0136_018:009a:4:1:10,KR5c0138_009:31b:3:17:4,KR5h0057_007:027b:2:17:30,KR5i0036_005:05p037b:2:12:14,KR6q0219_003:0050b:13:8:293
去至重，¶
棄至尊，¶
以為其所為也；¶	KR5c0126_029:13a:192:1:59,KR5c0138_009:31b:4:6:4
